entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023
